`client_ip` = #{set.clientIp},
`opr_class` = #{set.oprClass},
`opr_method` = #{set.oprMethod},
`opr_object` = #{set.oprObject},

`des` = #{set.des},

`create_by` = #{set.createBy},
`date_create` = #{set.dateCreate},
`update_by` = #{set.updateBy},
`date_update` = #{set.dateUpdate},
`serial_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Serial_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Serial_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

) and

#{item} and
(

) and
(
`Opr_object` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`type` in
#{item} and

) and
(

) and

#{item} and
`date_create` >= #{where.dateCreateSt} and
